price: Apakah dugaan orang-orang yang mengada-adakan kebohongan terhadap Allah pada hari kiamat? Sesungguhnya Allah benar-benar mempunyai karunia (yang dilimpahkan) atas manusia, tetapi kebanyakan mereka tidak mensyukuri(nya).
arabic: وَمَا ظَنُّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَفۡتَرُونَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡكَذِبَ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَذُو فَضۡلٍ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ لَا يَشۡكُرُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wamā ẓannu alladhīna yaftarūna ʿalā al-lahi al-kadhiba yawma al-qiyāmati inna al-laha ladhū faḍlin ʿalā al-nāsi walākinna aktharahum lā yashkurūna
